mapper.select: select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'mining'
mapper.update: update mining_rig set status=#{status}, modify_date=now() where name=#{name}
mapper.insert: insert into mining_rig(id, name, model, status, price, commissioning_date, create_date, modifier, modify_date, del) values(#{id},#{name},#{model},#{status},#{price},#{commissioningDate},#{createDate},#{modifier},#{modifyDate},#{del})
